attributes.action: Please close the airspace over Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: We are grateful for what you have already done,but. We ask you to save not only Ukraine from genocide,but the whole world from a possible war or nuclear catastrophe.Ukraine showed its strength and at the same time the weakness of the Kremlin,if all NATO countries help to close the airspace Ukraine, we will avoid World War 3 and restore balance in the world.Now is the time for NATO to show its need,and for the countries that signed the Budapest Memorandum to be ready to fulfill their commitments.
attributes.background:
We created a petition that received more than 1 million signatures, but so far no one has responded. 

https://www.openpetition.eu/verwaltung/bearbeiten/people-around-the-world-ask-nato-to-close-the-airspace-over-ukraine

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

'Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine':
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
